name: FOOD NORTHWEST
description: Food Northwest is an association of frozen food processors in Washington, Oregon, and Idah
sampleDescriptions: 1) Matters regarding the FDAs regulatory processes as it relates to frozen food processors; and, 2) Funding opportunities to improve water supply infrastructure.
